title: Drakin
summaries: The Drakin is a Hardmode enemy that spawns during waves 4–7 in Tier 2 and during waves 3–7 in Tier 3 of the Old One's Army event, and has a large amount of health and is immune to knockback, making it a very strong and tough enemy. It attacks by firing a barrage of Drakin Shot projectiles.
The Drakin requires 100 kills to be awarded completion of its corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
